data.subject: The One That Got Away
data.lyric:
You left a guy who told you where to be and when
 I was with a girl who tried to sleep with my best

data.subject: Better Late Than Forever
data.lyric:
I'm writing this song to tell you that I'm sorry
 Because I know you never thought that I'd be away

data.subject: Overrated
data.lyric:
Well I think the time has come
 to tell you how I feel about everything
 thats been inside my mind

data.subject: Flypaper
data.lyric:
Walk home
 drowning these memories in the rain
 Biting my lip
 to transfer this pain
 
 You're gone

data.subject: Radio Player
data.lyric:
there's a broken needle scratchin my 45 collection
 through a burned out, blown 2 speaker combinatio

data.subject: Scratch
data.lyric:
I've been sitting here for hours
 Burned an image of you in my mind
 Finding comfort in the words yo
